stage_identity.evidence: Byte maintains teen stage identity: long gangly limbs, fuzzy cyan-blue texture, big expressive eyes, awkward-but-endearing posture at desk

pixel_style.evidence: Clean pixel art with 2D forms, dithered shading on Byte's body, readable silhouette against dark background

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Night lighting transition complete: room now deep indigo-purple (was evening purple-pink), city lights twinkling through window. Laptop glow enhanced: bright white illumination casts on Byte's face and hands

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, malformed anatomy, duplicated parts, or smeared objects detected

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Trophy shelf: exactly one golden 10 trophy positioned on left side, exactly one green potted plant on right side with clear spacing between. Food bowl: exactly one bowl with kibble on floor to right of desk legs, no overlap with desk structure

anchors_present.evidence: Desk (wooden, center), oversized laptop (silver, dominating foreground), Chicago skyline window (left background with twinkling lights) all present and recognizable

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Late night coding state matched: Byte has alert open eyes, active typing posture, bright laptop glow appropriate for is_late_night_coding=true. Deep night sky visible through window matches temporal.time_of_day=night

reground_cleanup.evidence: Not applicable for normal mode - no reground performed
